pages.text: $(li)The Mud Bricks can be used to craft $(l)Mud Bricks Blocks$() and the $(l:patchouli:decoration/environmental/slabfish_effigy)Slabfish Effigy$(/l) in a $(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/crafting_table)Crafting Table$(/l).$(br)$(li)You can thrown them to other creatures right clicking while you are holding Mud Bricks in your hand.

$(li)They will inflict half of heart of damage and will push them away too.$(br)$(li)You can obtain Mud Bricks smelting $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/environmental/mud_ball)Mud Balls$(/l) in a $(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/furnace)Furnace$(/l), or $(l:patchouli:utility/environmental/kiln)Kiln$(/l).$(br)$(li)Ceramist will trade this item in exchange of $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/emerald)Emeralds$(/l) too.$(br)$(li)Their throw range is the largest compared to the $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/nether_brick)Nether Brick$(/l) (Lowest) and $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/brick)Brick$(/l) (Middle).
